game.s_dis: Papa's Sushiria is a restaurant management game where you prepare sushi rolls and bubble tea for customers to pay off your debt and master sushi-making.
game.l_dis:
Papa's Sushiria ‚Äì Roll Sushi & Serve Bubble Tea

Papa's Sushiria is a Flipline Studios time-management cooking game where you prepare sushi rolls and bubble tea for hungry customers. After accidentally breaking a lucky cat, you must work at Papa's Sushiria to pay off the debt.

What is Papa's Sushiria?

Papa's Sushiria challenges you to master sushi preparation‚Äîcooking rice, rolling sushi, adding toppings, slicing rolls, and serving drinks. Precision and multitasking are key to keeping customers satisfied.

How to Play Papa's Sushiria?

  • Order Station: Take detailed sushi and bubble tea orders from customers.
  • Cook Station: Prepare sushi rice with perfect timing and accuracy.
  • Build Station: Assemble sushi with ingredients, toppings, and sauces.
  • Cut Station: Slice rolls evenly to please customers.
  • Tea Station: Craft bubble teas with flavor, milk, and tapioca pearls.
  • Serve & Earn: Deliver sushi and drinks quickly to earn tips and unlock new content.

Why Play Papa's Sushiria Unblocked?

Papa's Sushiria Unblocked lets you roll sushi and serve bubble tea anytime‚Äîwhether at school, work, or home‚Äîright in your browser without restrictions.

Key Features

  • Sushi & Bubble Tea Combo: Prepare both sushi rolls and drinks for customers.
  • Multiple Stations: Manage rice cooking, roll building, slicing, and drink mixing.
  • Unlockable Ingredients: Discover new sushi toppings, sauces, and teas.
  • Customer Customization: Unlock new outfits and seasonal themes.
  • Special Recipes: Learn unique sushi creations for higher tips.

Sushi Master Challenge üç£

Think you have what it takes to master sushi rolling and bubble tea mixing? Papa's Sushiria will test your speed, precision, and multitasking skills. Can you keep the customers happy and pay off your debt?
